name: Black Mask

grantsPowers.name: Cripple
grantsPowers.description: Attack: Adds a debuff to the enemy's melee damage, reducing it by 20% for 15 seconds.

grantsPowers.name: Call Darkness
grantsPowers.description: All Attacks Count as From Behind

grantsPowers.name: Shadows Linger
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Increase Critical Damage Amount after losing Stealth

description: Black Masks are masters of disguise. Despite the rumors, they are not a group of heartless and evil killers, but rather cunning and sly assassins. They are employed by all that request their blade, even those who seek revenge from previous errands.
lore: We are the Hands of Fate. Our blades carve the channels which shape the river of Time. We are the true voice of Justice.
